title: An Act to prohibit negative option sales and disclosure of financial and personal information without a consumer’s express agreement

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Howitt of Seekonk, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 389) of Steven S. Howitt for legislation to prevent the automatic signing up of consumers for products or services.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/01/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 10/01/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-2                                       and Virtual Hearing location changed
